abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by Diana Ross to commemorate newly reopened Kings Theater in Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Diana Ross performed at the reopening of the renovated Kings Theater in Brooklyn on Tuesday night.

headline.main: Pop Royalty, Rechristening a Regal Stage
headline.seo: Diana Ross Reopens the Kings Theater in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Pop Royalty, Rechristening a Regal Stage

snippet: Diana Ross performed at the reopening of the renovated Kings Theater in Brooklyn on Tuesday night.
